name: Beautiful Baby Santa Hats
description:
Some extra special Santa hats for baby girls, with either a pretty ribbon bow, or gorgeous silky flower, and of course a dash of sparkle with individually applied crystal rhinestones. The hats are a very soft fleece and have been made in the UK. The sizing is for 6-12 months however they are nice and stretchy so can fit older babies too! 

The flower has been handmade with voille, with a beautiful silver button with iridescent crystal inner and scattered with teenie tiny rhinestones throughout the petals. The bow is of grosgrain and satin ribbon with a wooden heart button. 

The hat comes complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label and will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch with tiny iridescent crystals inside.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. Both fixtures have been securely stitched in place, however please be very careful when your child is wearing these hats and remain extra vigilant incase they are able to pull them loose and test the buttons out for a snack. The rhinestones have been set in place with a hotfix gun.

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Personalised bunting (priced from)
description:
A beautiful bit o' bunting, this will make a gorgeous addition to your little ladies bedroom or to add a unique touch to a special occasion. A collection of vintage/ novelty and plain triangles (a mix of high quality 100% cotton and polycotton fabrics) make up the nice big triangles which are available to be personalised with your child's name on each letter. Each triangle has a contrasting colour on the back so the bunting is reversible if wanted (without the lettering however). You may choose as many triangles as you would like . A minimum of six is suggested for the bunting to hang properly. We also advise that to 'frame' the initials, another unlettered triangle can be added on either end, refer to photos. This piece will remain a classic! 

First 6 triangles will be charged at £3 each, regardless of whether they are plain or lettered. Any additional lettering will be charged at £2 per triangle. Ie if you want bunting with 9 triangles, the first 6 will be £18, the 3 thereafter will be £6, therefore a total of £24. Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label. 

The bunting will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits 
Bunting triangles- 100% cotton and polycotton- 35% cotton, 65% polyester pieces 
String- poly cotton
In some instances bunting may come with other embellishments such as small bows and buttons on a few of the triangles. 

We recommend that you wash this item by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Please note that it is natural for appliqued items to gently fray over time, this is not a fault and adds a pretty effect.Not recommended to tumble dry. 

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing/accessories. This item should be well secured at either end when hung in a child's room and preferably out of reach of busy fingers, please remember that bunting is after all a long string and could pose a strangling hazard. The bias string has been double stitched with the triangle seams folded in-between for extra sturdiness throughout the whole bunting.

name: Swan Tutu
description:
Mae-anna's favourite design to date.  Adorable, super soft 100% cotton white tutu babygrow, made in the UK,  with three layers of folded tulle for the tutu, and a crushed white velvet swan, bedecked with some pretty iridescent rhinestones around it's neck, even swans need a bit of bling. Elegant, gorgeous and super cute. 

The netting has been attached on the outside so as not to irritate children's delicate skin and also folded so there is less likelihood of irritation and catching and ripping. Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label. 

The babygrow tutu will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch  with tiny iridescent crystals inside.

The Important Bits
Babygrow- 100% cotton
Tutu- bridal tulle 100% polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin)
Swan- crushed velvet, felt and cotton drill 
Rhinestones- hot fixed in place

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength and the rhinestones set in place with a hotfix gun.

name: Wild Baby Comforter
description:
Mae-anna has been busy enjoying animal prints of late, your little one will be all set for a safari adveture with this rather eye catching comforter. A giraffe patterned crushed velvet outer, and cerise satin on the inner offer a brilliant and exciting sensory experience for tiny fingers. The zebra and leopard print grosgrain tabs along the outer edges will also keep those fingers occupied, and the matching satin cerise bow and tabs make this comforter extra girly. A fun cloth sure to amuse, soothe and delight baby and mummies alike! Measures approx 25cm across all sides. 
Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The comforter comes gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Comforter outer- crushed velvet/ velour
Inner- Chinese satin
Animal tabs- grosgrain ribbon
Bow and tabs- Satin ribbon

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing/ accessories. The ribbon bow has been machine stitched in place to avoid small fingers pulling it off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength, and all the tabs have been stitched twice at different intervals within the seam to withstand the strain of tugging and nibbling!

name: Flower Hair slide
description:
Acessorize accessorize! This carefully crafted flower with a beautiful crystal rhinestone and pearl centre will make any outfit extra special. Attached to a nice child friendly hair clip that wont catch or snag your little ladies hair. Simple yet stunning!

The hair clip will come gift wrapped in a sweet white box, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch with iridescent and purple shredded tissue paper inside.

The Important Bits
Flower- voille
Button- metal with addition of crystal and pearl look studs
Slide- double prong (no alligator teeth) 

Not suitable for tiny ladies (0-3years) due to small parts

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Snuggly Muffler
description:
Snuggly and super chique, this muffler will look exquisite on wintery days or just to add an extra touch of class to a special outfit. Lovely soft cream fur outer, and lined with beautiful lilac satin, then embellished with a pair of satin roses with a silver baubaule bead. This muffler ties with matching purple grosgrain ribbons to keep it nicely in place. Simple, but one of our favourite items. Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label. The pattern has been kindly reproduced from the clever people at iThinkSew.com. 

This muffler will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch with tiny iridescent crystals inside.

The Important Bits
Outer-Ivory cuddle fur fabric 
Lining- Chinese satin, 100% polyester
Ties- Grosgrain ribbon
Flowers- as per lining with a silver bead

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon ties, as well as all seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength. The silver beads have been hand stitched in place approximately 7 times, but as with any item of clothing, please watch out for possible loosening of stitches over time, particularly the flower embellishments.

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Sugar Mouse dress
description:
A little pink sugar polka dot mouse has found her way onto this otherwise rather sophisticated dress. Double lined in the bodice and made in nice stretchy cotton material, this will see your princess through the toughest of play sessions. The grey spotted netting frills along the front collar and bottom look very stylish alongside the bright pink dress, and miss sugar mouse has been appliqued in a contrasting cotton fabric, her nose and whiskers hand stitched and then finished with a cute black satin ribbon for her tail. A black satin ribbon bow and bright pink button on the collar finish the look, a fun and gorgeous dress that looks even better on the little lady!
Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The dress will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch with tiny iridescent crystals inside.

The important bits
Main dress- cotton lycra- 5% two way spandex 95% Cotton
Frill- Dobby Spot grey Lace
Appliqued mouse- 100% cotton fabric and satin ribbon
Button- plastic, secured in place with a minimum of 7 stitches

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Please note that it is natural for appliqued items to gently fray over time, this is not a fault and adds a pretty effect. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength and the tiny button has been secured in place approx 7 times.

name: Petal Shower Skirt
description:
A flurry of pink and white rose petals have been swept up into this delightful little skirt which your little miss will love bouncing about in  and watching the petals shift and move. Approximately 40 petals lie inbetween a double layer of soft white netting, set against a precious baby pink lining. With a sweet pink bow to the side, this is an ultra girly and eye catching skirt, perfect for special occasions and perhaps a newborn favourite! Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The skirt will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Skirt body- softest polycotton- 65% polyester 35% cotton
Outer- Bridal tulle 100% polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin) 
Bow- Satin ribbon
Rose petals- Silk

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon has been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling it off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength. Please watch out for any rips in the netting should they occur, whereby the petals could spill out and also be tested as a snack!

name: Yummy Strawberry Tutu
description:
Yummy berries are a must for all little ladies. Three layers of double netting for ultimate cuteness, citrine and olivine coloured crystal rhinestones like typical strawberry markings, and an appliquéd green leafy trim around the neckline will ensure she looks cute enough to gobble up. Finished off with a lime green grosgrain bow on the neck line. 

The netting has been attached on the outside so as to not irritate children's delicate skin and also folded so there is less likelihood of irritation and catching and ripping. Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The outfit will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Babygrow- soft 100% cotton, made by a UK factory
Tutu- bridal tulle 100% polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin) 
Rhinestones- hot fixed
Green bow- grosgrain ribbon 

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon bow has been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling it off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

options.name: E-mail us for availability of other sizes

name: Dumpy Pots
description:
Practical and pretty pots- for when you just need somewhere to put 'those things' that can't find a place anywhere else...Socks, hair accessories, or even a home for a stray teddy. A cheeky cherry cotton print on the outside and a contrasting leafy lining will ensure these containers will look great in any setting for both children and mummies. The lip can be folded back up to make the pot taller if desired which will add approx another 4cm to the height. Measuring approx 16cm across the base diameter and approx 17cm (lip folded down). New fabrics coming soon, and special offers when you order more than one pot.
Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The pot/s will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Pot outer and lining- 100% cotton
Inner- Medium polyester batting
Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

name: Baby Ballerina
description:
Sugar and spice and all things nice... A sweet little outfit for babies up to toddler age. Softest 100% cotton babygrow made in the UK, with a cute frill in a gorgeous selection of cotton fabrics. A gathered layer of tulle just peeks out from underneath for extra puffiness. A matching hand appliqued cotton heart and little bow are stitched across the chest, just for extra sugar! Please note that the fabric of the frill and heart is not necessarily as will be supplied, this will depend on what is in stock at the time. Please e-mail me before ordering and I will tell you what I have available, there is always something to suit all tastes, from vintage to novelty! Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The babygrow will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch with tiny iridescent crystals inside.

The Important Bits
Babygrow- 100% cotton
Frill- 100% cotton
Underlay frill- bridal tulle 100% polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin)
Appliqued heart- 100% cotton
Bow- grosgrain ribbon
Buttons- mini plastic stitched in place approx 7 times

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Please note that it is natural for appliqued items to gently fray over time, this is not a fault and adds a pretty effect. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon bow and two buttons along the top collar have been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling it off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Newborn Fairy Hat
description:
An itty bitty hat for your newborn baby girl. A double layer of stretch 100% cotton for the hat in a rich purple, and a detachable silky bluey purple flower. Each petal has been hand made, and the flower is dotted with approx 10 silver diamanté rhinestones throughout for just a touch of sparkle. A gorgeous and unique hat for your baby that looks like it's been sent straight from the fairy workshop. Enjoy the cuteness! Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The hat will come gift wrapped in a sweet white box, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch with iridescent and purple shredded tissue paper inside.

The Important Bits
Main hat- 100% cotton stretch
Flower- Chiffon petals
Felt backing on flower with two tiny see through press studs
Rhinestones- hot fixed

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The flower is held in place by two tiny press studs which will make it hard for little ones to pull off and sample the flower, however one can never underestimate the dexterity of a baby either so please be vigilant.

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Gorgeous Skirts
description:
Mae-anna can't stop making these skirts! Addictive, as whatever the print they all look utterly adorable. From vintage floral to novelty prints, the options are endless. Patterns will vary as the material is limited so before oredring please drop me a line and we will e-mail you with what prints we have in stock. The skirts are lined in a plain colour and with the gathered tulle at the bottom peeking out, these skirts can be dressed up or down for any occasion. Play dates with dolly and mister ted, or a party option teamed with just a plain babygrow/ t-shirt, every little lady should have a full puffy skirt. Comes with exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The skirt will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Skirt outer- High quality 100% cotton
Inner- High quality plain polycotton 65% polyester 35% cotton
Netting frill- Bridal tulle 100% Polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin)
Bow- Satin or grosgrain ribbon
Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. Any embellishments have been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling them off and trying them for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Hair Clips-Large
description:
Make a statement with these beautiful and oversized bows, each is special in its own right and is sure to bring a big smile to your little one, or moreover a doting mummy. Made with a gorgeous variety of grosgrain/ satin ribbons and embellishments, (wooden buttons and diamantes) these are some of Mae-anna's favourite items to make. 

All bows are attached to a two prong flat backed clip so there are no snags and pulling of hair. They are easily removed whilst they are also good at staying in place. Bright colours, cute quirky patterns and all packaged up amongst purple and iridescent shredded paper in a clear pillow box will make these an ideal present. The bows measure approx 9cm in diameter.

Please choose your clip, they are in order from left to right and from top to bottom.

The Important Bits
Clips- Double prong metal
Bows- high quality grosgrain and double satin ribbon, with various embellishments secured with stitches or hot glue

Not suitable for very young babies/ children due to small parts and we advise not for those under 3 years of age.

options.name: Bright pink with sky blue flower
Bright pink and royal blue with crystal button
Doubel rusty red bow with wooden button

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Ye' Olde Country Skirt
description:
Chequered prints remain a timeless favourite. Coupled with large burgundy bows and gorgeous black lace, this wee skirt is just too cute! Beige, red and chocolate squares in a warm cotton fabric and fully lined, a delightful skirt for all occasions. Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The skirt will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Skirt outer- tartan cotton suiting, medium weight
Inner- Plain polycotton 35% cotton, 65% polyesrer
Bow- Double Satin ribbon
Lace trim- flat black lace

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon bows have been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling them off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Rainbow Sundae Dress
description:
The rainbow has spilled out into a waterfall of delicious and beautiful colours and onto this dress! A very light and floaty material drops from the bodice of this otherwise white dress (if you would like another colour as the main then please e-mail us, this will of course alter the effect of the colour of the sheer rainbow material. The hem hangs beautifully and if the sides are too long for your little one then simply tie them in a knot. The rainbow flower centred on the bodice can be removed which makes it easier for washing (secured by two clear press studs). Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The dress will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Dress body- cotton lycra 95% cotton 5% two way spandex 
Skirt- Chiffon
Flower- voille

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength. The flower is oversized and is held firmly in place by two clear press studs which makes it detachable, however as always please be vigilant and in the event that your 0-3yr old is able to pull the flower off, do not let them test it out for a snack!

name: 'Loving the Mess' Bibs
description:
Let's face it, babies are cute, their dribbles and little upsies are not! So deck them out in some fabulous fashion wear whilst mopping up the spills. A hot pink cotton bib with either cow/ leopard print hand appliqued cotton heart, and a cute white grosrgrain bow and tiny pink button on the side, voila! Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The bib will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Bib-100% cotton
Applique heart- 100% cotton
Bow- Grosgrain ribbon
Button- plastic

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item by hand to preserve it's longevity, although it has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry. Please note that it is natural for appliqued features to gently fray over time, this is not a fault and adds a pretty effect.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon bow and button have been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling them off and trying it for a snack.

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Beautiful Baby Blanket
description:
Time for extra hugs and cuddles and what is more special than a personalized blanket to wrap you precious bundle up in. With your child's name appliquéd towards the bottom in a selection of fabric prints, with itty bitty buttons and a blitz of eye catching color with a length of grosgrain ribbon. The front is a soft cotton t-shirting and the back is a soft and fluffy fur material, all nicely finished off with a matching bright bias around the edging. Please note that it is natural for appliqued items to gently fray over time, this is not a fault and adds a pretty effect. Approx measurements: length 94cm, breadth 75 cm. Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The blanket will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
T-shirting- 100% cotton
Fur- synthetic cuddle fur
Bias- Polycotton 
Ribbon- Grosgrain
Buttons- mini plastic

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to childre'n' clothing. The miniature buttons have been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling them off and trying them for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Grand Alice Bands
description:
Silky and elegant flower alice bands, these will give any outfit a special touch. Oversized flowers with handmade petals, and silver beads hidden in the centre for some sparkle!

The 'bow' alice bands are in an assortment of cute and bright grosgrain ribbons, complete with a tiny silver diamante in the center or a pretty wooden heart button, lots of fun.
Want another colour combination or different coloured flower, e-mail us and we will see what we can do!

The important bits-
Please be extra vigilant when using any accessory, all Mae-anna alice bands have been glued and sewn in place, but it is generally recommended that they are not suitable for those under 3 years of age due to small parts.

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Moo Cow Skirt
description:
Fun on the farm! A gorgeous cerise tulle frill, and a large matching double satin ribbon bow look fab against the humourous cow print on this skirt. Fully lined and, the tulle gather at the bottom will ensure a great 'puffy' look as your little one totters or rolls about. Most mootiful! Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The skirt will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Skirt outer- high quality 100% cotton
Lining- high quality polycotton 65% polyester 35% cotton
Bow- two layers of double satin ribbon in, bright pink and black
Gathered frill- bridal tulle 100% polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin)

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon has been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling it off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Rosebud Dress
description:
The fairies have been busy again! Tiny little ribbon roses made by their tiny fingers have been dotted onto this rich purple dress, then accentuated with a white broderie-anglaise frill along the bottom  and collar. The front is double lined to stop any irritation from the stitching that secures the roses in place. What a lovely dress for busy girls who always like to look their best! E-mail us if you would like the dress in another colour and we will see what we can do. Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The dress will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The important bits
Dress body- cotton Lycra 95% cotton 5% two way spandex
Frill- broderie-anglaise lace
Ribbon roses- satin ribbon

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon roses have been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling them off and trying them for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Candy Kitty Skirt
description:
Jungle kitty and candy pink, what better combination for a skirt perfect for just 'messing' about in. A leopard print design on the frill, waistband and flower make this simple skirt a fun item for your little ones wardrobe. The flower is finished off with a cute wooden heart button and pink grosgrain ribbon. Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The skirt will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Skirt body- Cotton 2 way spandex- 5% lycra 95% Cotton.
Frill and waist band- polyester netting 
Flower- grosgrain ribbon, wooden button

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's  clothing. The ribbon has been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling it off and trying it for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Cutie Pie Frilled Babygow
description:
Pink and white gingham checks and a scattering of freshly picked flowers are set for a charming little outfit. Babygrows needn't be a purely practical piece of clothing, the addition of a mini frill will be perfect for babies or toddlers to still easily move about it. The white, pink and matching gingham flowers are each secured in place with some careful stitches and random tiny pink buttons. A tiny pink grosgrain bow along the collar line has been added for a touch of cuteness . Comes with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The babygrow will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Babygrow- softest 100% cotton
Bow- Grosgrain ribbon
Buttons- plastic
Skirt and flowers- Gingham and plain polycotton- 65% polyester 35% cotton

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry. Please note that it is natural for appliqued items to gently fray over time, this is not a fault and adds a pretty effect. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The ribbon bow has been stitched in place approximately 7 times to avoid small fingers pulling it off, as well as the other buttons on the flowers. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.

name: Hair clips, small
description:
All bows are made of gorgeous grosgrain ribbon and attached to a two prong flat backed  clip so there are no snags and pulling of hair. They are easily removed from hair whilst they are are also great at staying in place. Bright colours, cute quirky patterns and all packaged up amongst purple and iridescent shredded paper in a clear pillow box will make these an ideal present. You will be supplied with two hair clips, (for both sides of the head) of the same design, unless you would like two different ones please e-mail us after ordering and we will package them up together. Fun hair clips will compliment any outfit.
Please choose your clip, they are in order from left to right and from top to bottom, measurements are approximately 7cm across.

The important bits
Clips- Double prong metal
Bows- high quality grosgrain and double satin ribbon, with various embellishments secured with stitches or hot glue
Not suitable for very young babies/ children due to small parts and we advise not for those under 3 years of age.

options.name: Mint green with purple with white spot

categories.name: Accessories- Hats, Bibs, Muffler, Hair Clips, Alice Bands

name: Ombre Mae-anna Tutu
description:
Mae-anna clearly loves purple! This little number has three layers of double netting in dark purple, light purple and white so as to create an ombre effect, and a stunning shimmery flower to finish the look. The flower has been hand made and is removable (attached with two clear press studs). Happy little floppy babies and tottering toddlers will look equally gorgeous in this tutu.

The netting has been attached on the outside so as not to irritate children's delicate skin and also folded so there is less likelihood of irritation and catching and ripping. Complete with an exclusive soft woven Mae-anna label.

The babygrow will come gift wrapped in beautiful tissue paper, organza ribbon, and with the special Mae-anna touch inside with tiny iridescent crystals.

The Important Bits
Babygrow- softest 100% cotton
Tutu- bridal tulle 100% polyester (This is a soft netting, ideal for babies delicate skin) 
Flower- Faux silk tafetta, voille and hotfixed rhinestones

Washing care- We recommend that you wash this item inside out and preferably by hand to preserve it's longevity, although this has been washed in the machine at 40'c and suffered no side effects. Not recommended to tumble dry.

The other important bits- Safety is particularly important when it comes to children's clothing. The flower is oversized and held firmly in place by two clear press studs at the back which makes it detachable, however as always please be vigilant and in the even that your 0-3 year old is able to pull the flower off, do not let them test it out for a snack. All seam ends have been double stitched for extra strength.
